name: Fortune Hill: Red Village
description: Clay Dawson took up an interest in the mystery of Fortune Hill. He recently found out that an unknown house has appeared randomly in the village of Brail which is located in the Scottish highlands, Clay gets in contact with Oliver Barren who lives just outside the village, Oliver has agreed to let Clay stay at his estate while they investigate the mysterious house, however, things take a horrifying turn. What will Clay find and what is he looking for?
